overview: The artist Bruce Nauman set the corner post of a fence on his ranch in Galisteo, New Mexico, one day and videotaped the process. As the title of Setting a Good Corner (Allegory & Metaphor) suggests, Nauman sees this simple, even mundane, activity as an allegory and metaphor for other areas of life. Maybe we are to see the work as a metaphor for making a work of art, since Nauman has chosen to film it for display in a museum. One of the key elements of the video is Naumanâ€™s decision to show us the entire process. He does not leave out the long digging scenes or edit the piece down to its most essential components.
title: Setting a Good Corner (Allegory & Metaphor)
